messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telecommunication failu*3mga;b4;'1vï¿½-BZZZT

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Primary Hallway.

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: The AI is confirmed malf, cut all the cams you see

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Hostile runtimes detected in all station systems, please deactivate your AI to prevent possible damage to its morality core.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
